autoFocus.description: Whether to autofocus the focusable elements in the pop-up
autoFocus.description_zh: 是否自动聚焦弹出框内的可聚焦元素

defaultPopupVisible.description: Whether the default pop-up box is on or off
defaultPopupVisible.description_zh: 默认弹出框是打开还是关闭

focusLock.description: Whether to lock focus within a pop-up box
focusLock.description_zh: 是否将焦点锁定在弹出框内

popupVisible.description: Whether the pop-up box is on or off. (Controlled)
popupVisible.description_zh: 弹出框是打开还是关闭。(受控)

unmountOnExit.description: Whether or not to destroy DOM nodes while hidden
unmountOnExit.description_zh: 是否在隐藏的时候销毁 DOM 节点

position.type: / top / tl / tr / bottom / bl / br / left / lt / lb / right / rt / rb
position.description: The direction of the pop-up box, there are 12 directions to choose from
position.description_zh: 弹出框的方位，有 12 个方位可供选择

:cancelButtonProps.description: Cancels the button's parameters to accept all the parameters of the Button component
:cancelButtonProps.description_zh: 取消按钮的参数，可接受 Button 组件的所有参数

:okButtonProps.description: Determines the parameters of the button, and accepts all parameters of the Button component
:okButtonProps.description_zh: 确定按钮的参数，可接受 Button 组件的所有参数

:triggerProps.description: All Trigger parameters can be accepted
:triggerProps.description_zh: 可以接受所有 Trigger 的参数

:content.description: Content. Function types are supported in 2.48.0
:content.description_zh: 内容.函数类型在 2.48.0 支持

title.description: Title. Function types are supported in 2.48.0
title.description_zh: 标题。 函数类型在 2.48.0 支持

events.name: onOk
events.description: Click the callback function of the Confirm button. The event parameter of the callback function is supported in 2.29.0
events.description_zh: 点击确认按钮的回调函数。回调函数 event 参数在 2.29.0 支持

events.name: onCancel
events.description: Click the callback function of the cancel button. The event parameter of the callback function is supported in 2.29.0
events.description_zh: 点击取消按钮的回调函数。 回调函数 event 参数在 2.29.0 支持

events.name: onVisibleChange
events.description: Pop up to open and close triggered callbacks
events.description_zh: 弹出打开和关闭触发的回调
